content.detailedDescription: My siting took place in a car while initially following the object and thenlater being followed by the same object. this occurred somewhere around 530 pm.That night, a local radio station, wiot, indicated that many motorists in thedetroit mi area had also reported being followed by a similar object around 1100that same evening.If interested, i will be happy to provide a more detailed narrative at anothertime.

Driving into my yard,grandaugter saw it first,asked is that a planei saw it and,said no it is not a plane.It was stationary.No pulsing lights.We sat in car watched the lights for a few minutes,i really wanted to go inside quickly.Wedid.We kept watching the lights for several minutes.Nothing changed.I called aneighbor to come up  see the lights.He didnt arrive till long after the lightsdisappeared.The lights remained over the mountain for close to 20minutes,total.We didnt observe the lights continually,the last i observed,thegreen  red lights left  right of the brilliant white light,they went out.Thewhite light appeared to turn right,then when i looked again,it were gone.I had agreat deal of apprehension,but didnt want to scare my grandaughter.The red green lights seemed to glow upon the treetops below them.They were as big as thewhite light,but not so brillant,more of a glow.The wind was blowing hard,socould not hear any sound,that might have been made.I was returning from the forddealership,because,my car had been recalled for a defect... i still have no ideawhat the lights were. i wish someone could tell me.Have seen none since.

My friend and i were driving west on the way home from work. we were drivingaway from the addison airport. it was in the afternoon and we spotted astar-like object in the sky witch we both thought was a star at first. i justthought that it was a bright star and since it was so bright you could see it inthe after noon. we just kept on starring at it except for me because i wasdriving, i tryed to keep looking up at it to figure out what it was after about5 minutes it just slowly vanished. thats when we new it wasnt a star.

1.Outdoors, urinating.2.Light change3.Mylar pig shaped balloon, except big and all lit up4.Peed on foot then fell to ground5.Pink and sort of looked like a cartoon pig at first. but not at second look.It moved slow then fast. and wobbled then sped away faster than a pig couldmove, so it wasnt a pig.6. yes

My husband and i were at a gas station by i-35 off se 59th st. in oklahoma citywe were putting air in his tires when he noticed the light. he brought it to myattention what was strange about this light is that it was pulsating but atfirst it didnt appear to be moving and as we left the station we noticed itstarted moving in a sw direction we followed it down the service road by theinterstate as it moved everytime  it would pulse it would appear in a differentspot it had zigzagging movement to it we followed it to 74th street and shildsblvd. we turned left on shields and continued to follow it it was stillpulsating and moving in a zig zag type pattern it just seemed to jump every timeit pulsed we could not see if it had a shape or not it was about the size of abaseball maybe just a little smaller we followed it about 3 or 4 more miles butit was traveling faster by then and we were losing site of it because of treesand buildings but it continued in a sw direction we finally gave up and wenthome. but about two days later at night i was going to the store and noticed itagain except it was traveling e to w but was pulsating like before except thistime it would jump quite a distance across the sky it went so far and seemed todisappear. we live between the air base and a airport so we are use to planesand there flight patterns i have never seen one like this before it wasdiffently something different but what i dont know.

I got ny camcorder out to focus on the overcast early in the morning. i saw anobject pulsating between a wite and blue glow. it looked to be in the upperatmosphere. it was southwest of my third story condo. i thought it could havebeen a sattelite, but it phased in and out sometimes. it was 425 on the morningof november, the 13th, 2002. later i lost sight of the object and went to bed.

As best as i can remember it was a saturday night and around the year of 1982,it must have been after 11pm or so, because the t.V. had went off the air. i wasin the second story bedroom of my grandmothers farmhouse in leavenworth kansas. i was the only person in the house that was still awake.  i wasnt real tired butthere wasnt anything to do so i layed down in bed next to the window.  watchingthe storm through the window i noticed that in the field next to my grandmothershouse were several balls of light darting all through this field.  they movedwithin the paremeters of this field like pin balls.  i was looking downward froman angle but from what i noticed they were fairly large, bright, and very fast.The lights were easy to see through the rain, but i cannot say whether theyhovered or were touching the ground. i would have to say that they were at least3ft by 3ft. my first reaction was that i was witnessing some sort of electricalstorm or maybe somekind of ball lightning. it was truly an amazing sight to see.I tryed to wake my brother and my uncle but had no luck, so,i watched them for along while then eventually i fell asleep.  that monday i asked my scienceteacher about them and he did not respond. he only looked at me as if i werelying about what i had seen.  honestly, i did see this. one thing that sticks inmy mind the most was the fact that these things did not leave the boundries ofthis field.  when they reached the end of the field they would bounce like apinball as if there were something it was bouncing off of. there was no fencethat i can remember and if there were, i dont think it was completly fenced. andit wasnt just one that i saw, there were several of them.  alot of time haspassed and i have never met anyone who has seen the same thing.  nor has thereever been anyone who could tell me what it might have been that i seen thatnight in the field.

1. woke by dogs barking, went to look at security camera monitor.2. i see awhite ball of light moving around in front of house.3. did not know,i thinkpossible ufo.4. excited,i go and wake up my wife, she sees it and tells me toinvite them in, i say hell no.5.Small round ball 5in. in diam. flying around infront of house, it lands and takes off several times that night.6. lifts off,andmoves around and flies away going east. we see this before many times

1975 800 p.M.  la habra, california. i was 13 years old and my father hadconverted our detatched garage into a bedroom. the garage was located appx. 20yards from the house in our backyard.  i was walking from the house to thegarage with my head down just looking at the ground. about half way between thetwo structures i stopped dead in my tracks. i had an overwhelming feeling that iwas being watched.  never before or since this incident have i ever had such astrong feeling of dread.  i lifted my head and looked out the corner of my eyesnot wanting to turn my head and look directly toward who or what was watchingme.  i was frozen with fear.  i saw a large house size orange sphere hoveringover a large tree in my neighbors backyard. the instant i looked up at it, theobject emmitted a large plume of steam. the object was totaly silent and beganto ascend in a north east direction. even at this young age of 13 i feltimmediatly that this craft was under the control of intelligent beings. becauseof the strong feeling that i was being watched and also the feeling that i hadscared them away.  just as the object began to rise i ran as fast as i couldfrom my backyard, through the house, yelling to my family to come outside. i ranout the front door and onto the lawn.  this dash through the house could nothave taken more than six seconds. but in that short time the object had risen toseveral thousand feet high. and now appeared to be more oval on shape and hadwhat appeared to be windows across the middle of the object.  the objectcontinued to rise as several members of my family and some neighbors watched. my brother and i looked at the object through a pair of binoculars and could seethe windows in more detail. they seemed to be black indentations in the body ofthe object that ran from end to end and parallel to the ground.   we observedthe object for appx. 6-8 minutes until it seemed to enter the upper atmosphereif not outer space. it finally just became to faint to see even with thebinoculars.  today i am 40 years old, and can still recall the overwhelmingfeelings of fear, dread and excitement of that night. this incident did not seemto effect the other wittnesses as severely as it has me. they did not have theclose one on one encounter that i had. if the object was a balloon as some havesuggested to me. then why did i have such a strong feeling of being watched    idont know what this was but i will never forget that night.
content.summary: Orange globe u.F.O.  experience in la habra ca.  1

content.detailedDescription: I had just gone outside to walk dog.  while waiting for her to do her business ilooked up to see if any stars were out.  it was cloudy in the east so i lookedback to the west to see beautiful stars.  it was gorgeous.  i found the bigdipper and started to look away when i noticed a row of about 10 amber coloredlights moving in a straight line.  i didnt think too much about it and suddenlya second row appeared to form a v pattern.  i kept trying to make sense of itlike maybe some kind of plane no, it was in a definate v pattern, a flock ofgeese no it was glowing amber lights and it was dead quiet.  just that quick, itstarted going sideways, one row of lights went out and then the next.There is no doubt in my mind it was some kind of ufo.  there is no logicalexplanation for it.
content.summary: Never imagined it could happen to me

content.detailedDescription: We came out of an evening class and were getting into the car when we saw theobject. it was still daylight in south texas. there were puffy scattered cumulusclouds in the sky.  we were on a hill and the object was a little above eyelevel where we were standing.  no one else seemed to notice but our group.  itseemed to be floating with the clouds and then it was gone.
Sleepingsirensa ufoscreamingit scared thouyes

I live in a wooded area between the town of sterlington and the community ofspencer, louisiana.  the other night i walked outside for a breath of fresh airit has been raining a lot here and i caught a break in the rain to walk outsidei happened to notice that the clouds were lighter and i could see some stars. when i looked to the n-ne, across the ouachita river toward morehouse parish, isaw a round star-like light moving slowly back and forth at about 30 degreesabove the horizon.  the light was white and steady, not pulsatingfrom time to time the light would show a hint of red.  i could see it between abreak in the trees.  it would hover more or less still for a while, and thenmove to the right or left.  occasionally it would move faster upward or downwardat a 90 degree angle.  it also would make little, tight circles.  i first saw itabout 800pm and watched it for fifteen or twenty minuntes.  i went inside for awhile and came back out around 930 and watched it for a few more minutes.  i didnotice there seemed to be a jet in the sky making large circles at a much higheraltitude.  i went back inside and went to bed.  i dont know if it could havebeen some sort of weather baloonit did kind of remind me of a baloon the way it just floated around making nonoticeable sound.  it did not behave like a jet, a helicopter, or an airplane.
content.summary: Bright light floating in louisiana night sky

content.detailedDescription: Upon exiting my house, i paused to check the clarity of the sky and noticed a v-shaped formation of crafts traveling at moderate rate of speed headingsouthwest.  we first thought they were a flock of geese, but they were traveling2-3 times faster than birds could fly, and were moving in an unvarying pattern.Our view tracked them through a 60 degree horizontal arc. i excitedly broughtthe object to the attention of my husband and 2 children.  they were veryexcited to see this as well.  my husband is reporting feeling unusually tiredtoday.

I was on bannister rd. in halifax, va at the age of 13. i saw a bright, solidglowing globe moving steady but very slowly at treetop level aprox 80 to 100feet from me. i followed this object for nearly 10 miniutes. i rode a bicycle ona dead end street which made a 30 degree turn at the chrest, where the objectturned to follow the road. it crossed a road perpindicular to the street it wasfollowing and slowly moved out of sight. speed could have been about 2 or 3 mph.It made absolutely no sound at all. i was cuious but not thrilled until about 6or 7 years ago. the roswell revelation made me rethink my memory
content.summary: Solid yellow white sphere with solid glow 5 to 10
San francisco ufo sighting on halloween night

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work in lousia ky on old road 23 i observed a tube shaped objectcovered with reg lights coming down the rock wall fast then slow down,cross theroad and go into the big sandy river i thought it was a car wreck so i sloweddown and watched it go under the water all the time seeing the red lights underthe water then before it reached the otherside.It stopped in the water and satthere,then it disappeared.

I was doing a little pre-season scouting for deer on ice mountain, near tyrone,pa late sunday afternoon. i had spent more time out in the woods than i hadplanned on, and the sun had already set as i made my way back to my jeep, when inoticed a bright light in the sky moving in my direction.At first i thought it was just an airplane and thought nothing of it. but thenit suddenly stopped moving and began to pulsate, getting brighter and thenfainter. i noticed at this time that there appeared to be a slight hazesurrounding the object. the pulsating increased in tempo until the object wasflickering at a very rapid rate, when suddenly, a bright beam of light shot downfrom the bottom of the object to the ground below. this was no searchlight. evena well focused searchlight tends to diffuse with distance, but this light was atight, bright beam from top to bottom.As suddenly as the pulsating began, it stopped, and the beam also turned off.The object just sat there motionless in the sky. my jeep was only about 100yards away when all this happened, so i ran to it to get my camera. i took apicture of the object as it hovered, and as i got ready to take another picturethe object it began moving around slowly in a tight circle. i took anotherpicture, but before i could take a third, it suddenly shot straight up in theair at fantastic speed and was gone from sight ill attach the two pictures i gotto an email message and send them in. i cropped them down a bit to reduce thefile size. i dont know what this thing was, but i know ive never seen anythinglike it before
content.summary: Ufo over ice mountain. central pennsylvania

content.detailedDescription:
1. in back yard at farm 2. it just stayed there and was bright
3. hellicopter 4. curious just watched it 5. oval light real bright...Have seen it numerous times in same general locationthought it was from attaberry. 6. went in the house tired of watching it, sometimes they moved.

I was driving back from a summer camp in the sierra foot hills with my dad, hewas driving.  it was uneventful and i turned my head to look at the navalstation in concord, when i noticed the object. i had seen many before, butalways looked closer and saw they were planes or helocopters.  i had been out ofthe loop of reading and watching documentarys about ufos so when i saw it i waskind of calm and noncelont about it.  the object it self was like a fisbee witha slight indentation on the top, it was refective goldish-silver color and wasjust hovering, soon i realzed it was slowly decending and moving back and forth.I looked away many times and it always was there when i looked back, but when mydad started to talk to me i looked away, when i looked back it was gone i lookedaround the area and didnt see a trace of the object. i simply shruged it off,but didnt tell any one about it, i dont know if my father saw it.

Entity experiencein november [1988], my dad was at a convention, and i slept with my mom.  thealarm clock went off, i popped up, sprung forward, then fell backwards.  icouldnt move, couldnt do anything but think.  i finally managed to move myfoot, then my leg, then sat up on the edge of the bed.  things felt like theywere out of sync, like a wave moving.  [i got up], put my hand on the door,walked toward the bathroom, put my hand on the wall, looked to the right intothe dining room, and saw this black figure [it was if it reflected no light atall]. then i went into the bathroom.  i got the toothpaste, started to brush myteeth, then thought about the figure.  i peeked out of the bathroom, didnt seeanything [in the dining room any more].  the figure had been so black that i sawno features.  there is lots of light in our house from streetlights, etc. [so ishould have been able to see more than i did.]the head was rounder than ours.  it also seemed bigger but not grossly.  it wasnot my nephew [who was living with us at the time], [he is] too tall.  theheight of the black figure was about 4 feet 8 inches to 5 feet tall, it was alittle shorter than my mom, who is 5 feet 1-1/2 inches tall.Other experiencesmy experiences go back to 1988; the first time was probably in july.  it was atnight, i heard a sound like thousands of blowtorches.  i couldnt move. [she wassleeping on the sofa on the porch at home.] i dont know how long it lasted, itseemed like forever.  then it cut off, and i ran to my parents room.  i calledthe police, they informed me that they had just received a call from someonejust a couple of blocks from me regarding an unusual sound.  another person iknow who lives in the camden area about a mile from the nsp generator plant,says they may have been letting off steam, but no way should i have heard it,since i live over 6 miles from the plant.  i called nsp and they informed methat they only let off steam about every ten years, and they said no way could ihave heard it from where i live.Three weeks later my parents were on the porch, around midnight, [theyapparently heard the same sound i had heard,] my dad wanted to go out, but thesound cut off suddenly.  a month later [after the entity experience], [approx. december 1988] dad washome, i had the same out-of-sync experience, with the wave thing.  [i wasstarting into the bathroom], dad said to me what are you doing?  you just wentinto the bathroom half an hour ago!  he said i was wearing a white night gown. i didnt have a white night gown!Years later, my nephew told me of hearing about abductions.  [i hadnt heard ofthem.]my most recent experience was at the end of march this year (2000).  has anyoneever had the experience of coming back into their body?  it felt like somethingbeing thrown at me; it bounced off my bed, into me.  our dog was still alive andjumped up, because she heard it.  it felt like it hit my chest area, but it hiton the left [side of my bed] first.  it was about early morning, i have it in myjournal.[from notes taken during telephone interviews on 9-18-00 and 10-19-02, andwritten testimony from the witness in october, 2002. william i. mcneff]
content.summary: Report of a black, non-reflecting entity, of human
Boomerang shape in texas, night time.

content.detailedDescription: I report this siting my father had 38 years ago. i am 44 and recently becamevery aware of this significant event in his and perhaps my life.  numeroussitings were witness by many in the following years in nearby jo davis county ilwhere we lived.  our neighbor was a vet who was specific about the precisionsurgery then haltingly vauge when we asked about cattle mutilation wed heardabout.

I was standing in my back yard after taking a swim around seven at night,shortly after dusk, when i had to go to the bathroom.  i stepped out into myback yard and was doing such, which i am embarassed to say, when i noticed awhining sound.  i looked over and saw this sphere hanging there in the air, notreally bobbing or anything, just like it was mounted in place.  the sound pickedup, and suddenly shot forward at high speed 30 feet infront of me or so.  itblurred with speed, then struck my fence and rattled the wood before goingthrough it and curving upward into the sky, disappearing at at least 1 mile asecond.  it left a 23.5 cm hole in the fence, which i repaired before my fathergot home, as i knew hed be mad at me and blame me for it.  i have the woodstill.  the wood itself was bored through smoothly.
content.summary: An object blew through my fence

content.detailedDescription: We were at our home in thailand. 2 dogs kept barking for 10 to 15 mins. everyhr. 3 did not know, ufo 4 excited, woke up wife, she said to go out and invitethem in. i said no way. 5fly aroud in front of our home, land on pourch, lift upand land on driveway, stay there for some time, then lift up and fly down thestreet and out of sight.

My son was driving our minivan and i was in the passenger seat.  he was on hisway to his friends house.  it was dark at about 626-628 pm.  we were travellingdown a limestone road, and we were the only vehicle around.  it was partlycloudy, no wind, clear--no rain.  we noticed the lights of the object first.  itseemed as though it was just sitting in the sky, hovering, i suppose.  thelights looked square, yet appeared to be in a strip.  the lights seemed to beshaped in a half moon shape.  my son kept saying, what is that  and he stoppedthe van.  he was so excited and we both could not figure out what it was.  itwas hovering as we stopped then just went straight up, very fast.  it travelledas high as a big commercial airliner would be in the time it would take you tosay one.  as it went up the lights went off for a minute, then came back on andthen it was just gone.  once it seemed to disappear, we left and travelled on toour destination.
content.summary: My son and i saw what we think is an ufo

content.detailedDescription: narrative description(from audio tape of witness, "tony" moreno)"i was in my backyard at approximately 1:15 p. m. in the afternoon.  i wasgetting a sun tan and starting to do setup exercises in my backyard, i waslooking up towards the sky.  beautiful sunny day, to sunny, my eyes weresquinting, i couldnt see clearly.  all the sudden i i see a sparkle up in thesky, way, way, up high.  i mean really high.  and as i looked, kept looking, isaw it was like a stick, so i figured it was a satellite, or a space station orsomething way up above in space.  as i kept looking at it i saw the it kind ofmoved or twisted or curved and that drew my attention to several other littleobjects that were around it, then i thought, hmmmm, maybe its a bunch of loosekites or something strange.  and as i kept looking i noticed it was way to highto be kites and they were more or less stationary with clouds moving underneaththem and through them.  so that made me freak out; i jumped into my house and i,for some stranger reason had a video camera with half the battery left in it,rushed outside, could not find the object with my plain eye, i looked in theviewfinder and i started finding it through the viewfinder of the camera.  andthats when i started noticing the details like all the other objects and lateri saw a triangle shape and i think some of the objects were jetting around,moving around, it seemed others were "morphing".  i saw the candy cane-cane turninto a "t" into a "j", into a weirs "s"and  i saw one of the objects underneathturn into a delta configuration by itself and um, i could not believe what i wasseeing; i lost it in a cloud.  i put my camera away and thought "wow". that wasincredible that will never happen again and about five minutes later i looked upand saw the same sparkle!  so once again i got my camera; this time i rememberedto put the date and time program into the camera.  i got a lot of referencepoints between my roof and other little birds that were flying around.""to me, the most incredible thing was that although it was very high up in thesky it seemed to be over the flight path of incoming jets to miami internationalairport, since i live there i see that all the time.  of course the jets aremuch, much lower.  sometimes they are up high, but believe me, not even half ashigh as well as what i saw.  and i just thought it was pretty strange.  this allhappened at about 1:30 pm on tuesday, oct. 22nd, 2002.  my name is tony moreno."investigators notes

Just arrived at home in country, exited car, saw bright white approaching fromn.W. first thought was low flying aircraft w landing lights on. tried to recordwith handy-cam,battery dead. watched and memorized detail. called wifeat her location to go outside to look. 75 yds. long, approx. shape triangular,no sound of propulsion, trailing golden threads with what looked like glowingchristmas tree globes attached, trailing approx. 150 yds. behind. disappearedbehind tree line, gaining altitude slowly. newspaper described it as a russianrocket burning up on re-entry. the object was extremely high at the time of thewitnesses in the city. can identify longitude, latitude, and approx. site oftake-off. will have to look up. bob paillet 903- 523 4710. missyjose@aol.Com
content.summary: Close up view of object in flight

content.detailedDescription: At the timei was in the township of stroudsburg pa. where i resided in an apartment complexthat had a porch looking out towards the woods this was back in 1994 on themonth of july i cant remember the exact date.  i do know it was during aweekend. i was at the porch ironing my waiter uniform around 830 pm because iwas getting it ready for the following day for work. some times, i look up atnight to see the night skies, especially if its nice and crystal clear.  on thenight i was ironing my uniform it just happened to be one of those exceptionalnights with a nice pitch black and cloudless nights. i looked up and i saw thisstrange luminous object slowly and gently hovering over the pines trees that arepresent just over the porch. at first i thought it was a star with its purplish3e
content.summary: Bluish purplelish spheres hovering over  the skies
